website_summaries.verdict: Kids will love riding with the Hulk character, which gives this fun car seat a distinctive green color.
pros: Uses a 5-point harness and a 3-position headrest for safety and comfort
The 2 cup holders are held inside the Hulk's hands for a fun design feature
Offers a full back for comfort that also makes it look like Hulk is hugging the child
cons: Difficult to buckle with larger children in the seat because of narrow design

customer_reviews.title: Chest clip malfunction
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3, one hulk, one belle, and one iron man. All 3’s chest clip slips down while driving. Now we all no that if the chest clip isn’t in the correct spot and you get into a accident, the car seat will not protect your child properly. They could be ejected. I can’t return them now because I already destroyed the boxes. I will contact the company that made this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat, but straps get twisted all the time
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that drives me nuts about the car seat is the straps get twisted up and all backwards really easily. Other than that I have four different types of these car seat, my kids love them sooo much. We have iron man, hulk, Cinderella and princess belle. They’re really easy for transitioning from harness to seat belt as well. We’re always getting compliments how much people love them and have never seen a car seat that was so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great novelty item, but not practical for long trips
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited to receive his new carseat, but he was crying to get out of his carseat on the 1st trip we took (3 hours) because his bottom hurt. This carseat has no cushion in the seat & is very hard. It's a great novelty item, but not very practical for long use.
customer_reviews.author: delea

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY! DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: Yes! If you’re considering buying these stop now and just do it! They’re adorable, affordable and GREAT quality! This company does not skimp on quality at all. Any little one would be thrilled with this seat. Just as good if not better than the store brands and cost is lower than many big brands. Also, SUPER HEROS! I mean what more is there??
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love the design not the install
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with the hulk and i was So excited about this seat. We cannot figure out how to get the buckle up more and it keeps pinching his skin. We also had to use the latch system even though we didn’t want to. I wish it was a little easier to figure out and configure.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Very cool car seat
customer_reviews.text: I have autism and like a 8 year old I like my kids embrace marvel avengers the Hulk car seat very cool seat it is comfortableb and and easy it was not hard to assemble i like the box it come in and I like Avengers and super hero like the Hulk And and batman and spider man to
customer_reviews.author: drew darling

customer_reviews.title: Love everything about it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. The colors are bright. It's so much easier to install and remove than the old ones. I've already had to take this one out and clean it, my grandson "hosed it down". The instructions are easy to follow, if you need them. My grandson loves this seat!
customer_reviews.author: slmccoy

customer_reviews.title: Safe & EZ to install & remove
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait for my 3 yr old grandson to see this new Hulk car seat! I bought him Spider-Man for his Dads truck for his birthday. After using Spidey myself & noticing how much lighter & easier to instal it is was than my other car seat, I ordered “The Hulk” for myself. I also purchased this one from ‘amazon warehouse’ . (like new-open box) Content was perfect! Box was taped as it had a been torn, no problem with that & it saved a few $s.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Will purchase again for my younger child when he gets big enough. We get so many compliments on it when going through drive ups or doing grocery pick up!

customer_reviews.title: Hulk smash!
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is seriously awesome! My 4 year old feels like the coolest kid riding around. It's very durable especially if you have a child like mine. (Mini tornado) Safe and stylish! Mom and son approved!

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Hulk
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat it was easy to get in my van. It’s definitely in the bigger side. I would not be able to fit three in one row. My son loves it! I wish the head peice was easier to adjust. And I wish it had the latch system

customer_reviews.title: Despite almost having a hear attack after looking in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Despite almost having a hear attack after looking in the rear view mirror, this car seat has been nothing but positive for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: I love the design as did my 3 year old daughter who is obsessed with Hulk. I don’t trust the seat to keep my daughter safe. I used the latch, and the seat moved all over the place. I added the seat belt, and it was still super wobbly. Finally I added the tether and it was wiggly still! That thing should have not moved a bit! It has nice features and has a high weight and height limit which is why I chose it, but I don’t want to risk the safety of my child for nice features.
customer_reviews.author: d2surfer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to tighten
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my almost 4 year old son. He loves it. I find it okay... It is impossibly hard to tighten on my son. I dont know if I am just a weakling or what, but when I go to tighten it on his shoulders ad chest it does not ever get as tight as I would like.

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun chair that my son who is almost 4 yrs
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun chair that my son who is almost 4 yrs. old is thrilled with. It is a little difficult to buckle in front hopefully over time it will get easier. Also it’s better to have small hands buckle it in to the car as it’s not that easy to get your hand through the back to move the seat if needed. Overall we are satisfied with the product. It did take a little getting use to seeing Hulk in the backseat. The first couple of days I looked in the mirror & got scared bc it looked like someone was in the car with me when I was alone!!! lol. 😆

product_meta.title: KidsEmbrace 2-in-1 Harness Booster Car Seat, Marvel Avengers Incredible Hulk
product_meta.description: Style:Incredible HulkYour child will love hopping into the car knowing the Incredible Hulk is along for the ride! The KidsEmbrace Marvel Avengers Incredible Hulk 2-in-1 Booster Car Seat has been rigorously tested and exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213), plus it was given a "Best Bet" rating by the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety. Great for toddlers and older kids alike, this combination booster car seat is approved for forward-facing use with the five-point harness for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height, and it can be converted into a belt-positioning booster car seat for boys and girls between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height. The booster seat harness straps are easy to adjust with one hand. The crotch belt can be used in two different positions to accommodate your growing child, and the headrest can be adjusted to three different heights. The headrest also features energy-absorbing EPS foam for maximum side-impact protection. The contoured seat is comfortable for long rides, and the cushioned seat cover is machine-washable for easy cleaning. Two cup holders provide a handy place for drinks, snacks, or toys. The combination five-point harness high-back booster car seat is easy to install with or without LATCH and the top tether. It measures 19-1/2 by 19 by 29-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest down) to 19-1/2 by 19 by to 32-1/2 (L x W x H) (headrest up), and it weighs 15 pounds.
feature_bullets: 5-POINT HARNESS SECURITY: Two position points at each shoulder, two position points at the child's hips, and one point where the harness buckles between the legs to give your child the best possible protection
3-HARNESS POSITION: There are three slots to position the harness shoulder straps depending on the age and height of your child. Shoulder straps should be at or just above the shoulders

TWO MODE OPTIONS: Forward-facing five-point harness car seat is made for children between 22 and 65 pounds and 29 to 49 inches in height. Convert to a belt-positioning booster seat for older kids between 30 and 100 pounds and 38 to 57 inches in height
SAFETY CERTIFICATIONS: Insurance Institute for Highway Safety "Best Bet" rating for booster car seats; exceeds Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (FMVSS 213)
ADDED COMFORT: Three-position adjustable height headrest is equipped with energy-absorbing EPS foam. Two cup holders provide added convenience to hold drinks or store treats and small trinkets

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars285 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
